game.name: Duck and the Land of Flightless Birds
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Duck and the Land of Flightless Birds - A charming platforming adventure where you play as a fat duck that can't fly.
